spell_lightning.comment: damage2 is static dmg per instance
spell_lightning.comment2: duration2 is max static effect instances

spell_amplify_magic.comment: damage is base percent of split projectiles
spell_amplify_magic.comment2: damage2 is max percent of split projectiles

spell_dash.comment: damage crossing over 2 will deal damage to objects
spell_dash.comment2: damage2 is max velocity percent modifier, max reaching 100

spell_foci_arcs.comment: damage2 is static dmg per instance

spell_guard_body.comment: damage is base armor recover per sustain
spell_guard_body.comment2: damage2 is base armor recover to max

spell_guard_spirit.comment: damage is base armor recover per sustain
spell_guard_spirit.comment2: damage2 is base armor recover to max

spell_divine_guard.comment: damage is base armor recover per sustain
spell_divine_guard.comment2: damage2 is base armor recover to max

spell_pinpoint.comment2: damage2 is percent of damage bonus

spell_turn_undead.comment: damage2 is threshold for effect, 1 is fear, 2 is smite, 3 is burning

spell_divine_zeal.comment: damage is bonus weapon table damage percent
spell_divine_zeal.comment2: damage2 is bonus weapon table max

spell_alter_instrument.comment: damage is starting gold cost, negative mult to reduce cost

spell_envenom_weapon.comment: damage is on-hit bonus and poison mult
spell_envenom_weapon.comment2: damage2 is max on-hit bonus and mult

spell_psychic_spear.comment: hp higher than duration2 percent adds to damage2

spell_defy_flesh.comment2: duration2 is HP interval per charge

spell_blood_waves.comment4: duration is min HP percent after cast
spell_blood_waves.comment3: duration2 is HP loss per cast

spell_metallurgy.comment: damage is percent of item value, scaled up to max 100 percent

spell_geomancy.comment: damage is percent of item value, scaled up to max 100 percent

spell_forge_key.comment: damage is starting gold cost percent, negative mult to reduce cost
spell_forge_key.comment2: damage2 is min gold cost discount percent

spell_forge_jewel.comment: damage is starting gold cost percent, negative mult to reduce cost
spell_forge_jewel.comment2: damage2 is min gold cost discount percent

spell_enhance_weapon.comment2: damage2 is min gold cost discount percent

spell_reshape_weapon.comment: damage is starting gold cost percent, negative mult to reduce cost
spell_reshape_weapon.comment2: damage2 is min gold cost discount percent

spell_alter_arrow.comment: damage is starting gold cost percent, negative mult to reduce cost
spell_alter_arrow.comment2: damage2 is min gold cost discount percent

spell_lead_bolt.comment: damage2 is gold cost, negative mult to reduce cost

spell_mercury_bolt.comment: damage2 is gold cost, negative mult to reduce cost

spell_revenant_curse.comment2: damage2 is max percent stats kept

spell_cowardice.comment: damage is stat str con drop

spell_windgate.comment: damage is tile distance to affect
spell_windgate.comment3: duration2 is max tile distance to affect

spell_abundance.comment: damage is base percent chance, damage2 is max percent chance
spell_abundance.comment2: duration2 is percent mana cost per proc

spell_greater_abundance.comment: damage is base percent chance, damage2 is max percent chance
spell_greater_abundance.comment2: duration2 is percent mana cost per proc

spell_preserve.comment: damage is base mana cost, damage2 is min cost

spell_restore.comment: damage is gold cost as percent of item value
spell_restore.comment3: duration is item value percent to mana cost
spell_restore.comment4: duration2 is min gold cost percent

spell_harvest_trap.comment: damage is amount of metal scrap retrieved
spell_harvest_trap.comment2: damage is amount of magic scrap retrieved

spell_mist_form.comment2: damage2 is min mana cost proc

spell_splinter_gear.comment: damage2 is percent bonus damage on fully breaking

spell_attract_items.comment2: damage2 is max range to attract if scaled

spell_return_items.comment2: damage2 is min ticks if scaled
spell_return_items.comment3: duration2 is mana cost to return

spell_absorb_magic.comment: damage is resist reduction percent per hit
spell_absorb_magic.comment2: damage2 is max resist reduction percent

spell_demesne_door.comment3: damage2 is pass effect strength max

spell_flame_cloak.comment: damage is base chance on hit fire
spell_flame_cloak.comment2: damage2 is max chance on hit fire

spell_lightning_bolt.comment: damage2 is static dmg per instance
spell_lightning_bolt.comment2: duration2 is max static effect instances

spell_disrupt_earth.comment2: duration2 is disruption time per impact

spell_chronomic_field.comment: damage is max projectiles before expiry

spell_thorns.comment: damage is transferred effect to shrub or roots and on-hit bonus
spell_thorns.comment2: damage2 is damage limit from on-hit

spell_bladevines.comment: damage is transferred effect to shrub or roots and on-hit bonus
spell_bladevines.comment2: damage2 is damage limit from on-hit

spell_foci_light_peace.comment: damage2 is heal interval reduction per tier

spell_foci_light_justice.comment2: duration2 is base damage percent bonus

spell_foci_light_purity.comment: damage2 is cure interval reduction per tier
